name: ClickMe
description:
Game done by Alexandre SANANIKONE and François MARTINAGE for the 1-bit game jam. The goal was to do a black and white game with the theme one button. The theme is done by having only one button able to make you win the game.

You must find the button, which is the one that is on the right corner of the screen. Some other button can remove, or add obstacle ! beware on which one you clic !

Have fun with the game and let a comment if you liked it!

Edit: the browser build as been repaired after the jam ratings
